Full Name


import { Component } from '@angular/core'; import { NgForm, FormControl, NgModel} from '@angular/forms'; @Component({ selector: 'app-form', templateUrl: './form.component.html', styleUrls: ['./form.component.css'] }) export class FormComponent { onSubmit(f:NgForm){ console.log(f); } getValue(name:NgModel){ console.log(name); } }
